utter_complain/late.text: I am so sorry to hear that your order didn't arrive yet. May I have your order number please So, I can record your query?

utter_complain/damage.text: I am very sorry to hear that you received a defected order. Please let me know your order number, also do you need replacement or refund for the item?

utter_complain/size_issue.text: My sincere apology for sending you a wrong size item. May I have your order number please, also do you need replacement or refund for the item?
